text: Jello Biafra (born Eric Reed Boucher; June 17, 1958) is an American musician and spoken word artist. Biafra was the lead singer and songwriter for San Francisco punk rock band Dead Kennedys. He started the record label Alternative Tentacles with East Bay Ray in 1979. Biafra is a member of the Green Party of the United States.Biafra, Jello. "Platform for 2000 Green Party Presidential Primary". March 7, 2000. He ran for president in 2000. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Biafra's label Alternative Tentacles Category:Living people Category:1958 births Category:Actors from Colorado Category:American anarchists Category:American atheists Category:Musicians from Colorado Category:Musicians from San Francisco Category:People from Boulder, Colorado Category:Green Party of the United States politicians Category:Actors from San Francisco Category:Punk musicians
title: Jello Biafra
